PrecisAmendment to Order in Council P.C. 1996-1201 of August 7, 1996, as amended by Order in Council P.C. 1997-1110 of August 20, 1997, which will extend the term of appointment of the HONOURABLE ROBERT CARMAN COATES as a permanent member of the Canadian International Trade Tribunal until January 31, 1998.
